	{{html:

	<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/jquery-ui/jquery-ui-1.10.0.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	
	<script>
	$(function() {
    // Stick the #nav to the top of the window
    var nav = $('.sidebar-nav');
    var navHomeY = nav.offset().top;
    var isFixed = false;
    var $w = $(window);
    $w.scroll(function() {
        var scrollTop = $w.scrollTop();
        var shouldBeFixed = scrollTop > navHomeY;
        if (shouldBeFixed && !isFixed) {
            nav.css({
                position: 'fixed',
                top: 20,
                left: nav.offset().left,
                width: nav.width()
            });
            isFixed = true;
        }
        else if (!shouldBeFixed && isFixed)
        {
            nav.css({
                position: 'static'
            });
            isFixed = false;
        }
    });
});
	</script>

	<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/angular/angular.js"></script>
	<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/angular-ui/ui-bootstrap-tpls-0.5.0.js"></script>
